overview: Dirty cops take the law into their own hands, especially when they come across a naughty young man getting up to no good. Sometimes it’s better to give them a hard life lesson than take up their time with paperwork, and it’s a whole lot more fun too! Using their powerful position to impose themselves upon the petty criminals, these bad cops won’t let the perps go until they’ve learnt their lesson the hard way, and leave with their faces covered in policeman spunk whilst the bent copper pulls up his uniform and walks away, another job done for the good of the community!
title: Bad Cops
